Reviews.Title: what band of 3g are working this phone?
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Loor
Reviews.Content: i would like to buy, but i need one phone with work on 1,2,5,6 what band of 3g work this phone?

Reviews.Title: Blackberry curve 9330
Reviews.Author: Virginia
Reviews.Content: El proveedor dio repuesta de inmediata, el equipo llego en buen estado, funciona en Venezuela, le colocamos linea movistar y funciona sin problema

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Jose Cermeno
Reviews.Content: He comprado este BlackBerry Curve 9220 Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Phone with QWERTY para usar en venezuela, funciona perfectamente bien, el articulo es tal cual como esta en la descripcion, excelente compra

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Borges
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much for the quality of the product is good and I highly recommend it, just continue like delivering quality products and competitive.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Rachel Wolfe "RWolfe"
Reviews.Content: Nice BB - worked perfectly with local sim cards in China and India. Slim and easy to use, would buy again.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2.44-Inch TFT Display, 320 x 240 pixels; Touch-sensitive optical track pad; BlackBerry OS 7.1; Wi-Fi; Bluetooth; Document Viewer; HTML Browser; Internal Memory: 512 MB ROM, 512 MB RAM and MicroSD Card Slot expandable up to 32GB.
2MP Camera, 1600x1200 pixels; QWERTY Keypad; MP3/MP4 Player; FM Radio with RDS; Sensors: Accelerometer, proximity, compass; Messaging: Blackberry Messenger, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM and 3.5mm Audio Jack.
Talk time up to 7 hrs - Stand-by up to 432 hrs
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 9220 Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Phone with QWERTY Keypad, 2MP Camera, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth - US Warranty - Black
